original_text:
if I have eaten its yield without payment
    and made its owners breathe their last,
korean_text: 만일 내가 값을 내지 않고 그 소출을 먹고 그 소유주가 생명을 잃게 하였다면

sentences.original_text: if I have eaten its yield without payment
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 값을 지불하지 않고 그 소산을 먹었다면

sentences.original_text: and made its owners breathe their last,
